alert.note: Alert for Morris (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 3:28PM EST until December 19 at 3:25AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Jersey... Rockaway River At Boonton Above Resvr affecting Morris County. For the Rockaway River...including Boonton Above Resvr...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rockaway River at Boonton Above Resvr. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 2.0 feet, The Rockaway River leaves its banks and begins to flood the river parking lot at St. Clare`s Hospital. At 3.5 feet, The Rockaway River leaves its banks and floods adjacent parks and trails in Denville including Gardner park. At 5.0 feet, Savage Road and other roads around Gardner Park in Denville flood. At 5.5 feet, The main parking lot at St. Clare`s Hospital begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 4.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:15 PM EST Monday was 4.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 4.7 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 4.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 3.7 feet on 05/01/2014. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (1 pm) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Stg Time Date Rockaway River Boonton Above R 4.5 4.6 Mon 3 pm 3.5 2.8 4.7 7pm 12/18 &&
info.instruction: Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 330 AM EST.
